lines.text: Don't take life too seriously. You'll never get out of it alive.
Daddy! You're back from Peru! And we thought you had been run over by an elevator!
[Bugs and Wile E. are laying on a rock, with their heads opposite one another]
Let me see now. It is obvious that this is no ordinary rabbit. Therefore, I must dream up a brilliant master strategy, ingenious, daring. Now, what if I lured him into a rock crusher?
Right, too complicated. But what if I built a Burmese tiger trap?
Yeah, yeah, too much detail. Hmm. I've got it!
Yes. Listen, you know what a sucker he is for carrots.
So what I do is, I fill some carrots full of dynamite. He eats 'em...
[he startles Wile E., who flies up and then falls down]
